meanings: [명사] determination, resolution, resolve, [동사] be determined, (formal) resolve

vlive.korean: 5시간 V LIVE요 여러분? 진짜 각오하고 해야겠는데요? A 5-hour V LIVE? I have to be really determined. 듣기 View video N.Flying : 우리 얘기 좀 합시다 #49
vlive.english: A 5-hour V LIVE? I have to be really determined.

vlive.korean: 이쯤 오니까 목표랑 각오 이런 거 물어봤을 때 - 목포요? at this point, when I'm asked about my goal, - Gold? 듣기 View video BTS : [Full] BTS Comeback Special: '보'이는 '라'이브 '해'요
vlive.english: at this point, when I'm asked about my goal, - Gold?

vlive.korean: 어떤 각오를 보여줘요? What kind of that? 듣기 View video WINNER : 강승윤 생일 브이라이브 🎉YOONSBIRTHDAY🙏🏼❤️
"울 승윤 이번 연도 각오는?" "What's your goal for this year, YOON?" 듣기 View video WINNER : 강승윤 생일 브이라이브 🎉YOONSBIRTHDAY🙏🏼❤️
vlive.english: "What's your goal for this year, YOON?"

vlive.korean: 왔는데 벌써? - "울 승윤 이번 연도 각오는?" Already. - "YOON, what's your goal for this year?" 듣기 View video WINNER : 강승윤 생일 브이라이브 🎉YOONSBIRTHDAY🙏🏼❤️
vlive.english: Already. - "YOON, what's your goal for this year?"

examples.korean: She was ready and primed for action. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 행동할 각오와 대비가 되어 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She was ready and primed for action. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He worked with renewed vigour and determination. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 새로운 활력과 각오로 일을 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He worked with renewed vigour and determination. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She never wavered in her determination to succeed. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 성공하겠다는 각오가 결코 약해지지[흔들리지] 않았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She never wavered in her determination to succeed. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: It is heartening to see the determination of these young people. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이 젊은 사람들의 각오를 보니 힘이 난다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It is heartening to see the determination of these young people. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I was preparing to leave. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 떠날 각오를 하고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
